column3: The sum of the earnings per share for the four quarters differs from annual earnings per share due to the required method of computing the weighted average shares outstanding in interim periods. All per share amounts have been adjusted to reflect the Reverse Stock Split. See Note 1: "Organization" for further discussion.

Weighted average shares outstanding used in the computation of basic and diluted earnings per share and cash dividends declared per share were adjusted to reflect the 1-for-3Â reverse stock split that occurred on January 3, 2017.
